name: 蘇春
objective: 先修課程：負責教授同意。材料一般性質之介紹、化學對材料性質的影響、原子在晶體內的堆積方式及 X 光繞射、固體內原子排列的不規則性和原子擴散、固體傳導電子特性、凝固的各種物理性質、相金屬和有關的各種機械性質、鋼鐵材料及其應用。Prerequisite: Consent of Instructor General Properties of Materials, Chemical Effects to Material Properties, Atomic Packing Types in Crystals and X-ray Diffraction, Imperfections of Atomic Arrangement in Solids and Atomic Diffusion, Conduction of Electrons in Solids, Solidification, Physical Properties, Metals and their Mechanical Properties, Ferrous Materials and their Applications.
schedule:
Week 1: 結構與性質 Structure and Properties (1)
Week 2: 材料性質劣化 Deterioration of Material Properties (2)
Week 3: 固溶強化 Solid-Solution Strengthening (3)
Week 4: 形變硬化與退火 Deformation Hardening and Annealing (4)
Week 5: 多相強化 Multiphase Strengthening (5)
Week 6: 析出硬化 Precipitation Hardening (6)
Week 7: 麻田散鐵變態 Martensitic Transformation (7)
Week 8: 低 / 中碳鋼 Low-/ Medium-Carbon Steels (8, 9)
Week 9:	期中考 Midterm Exam 
Week 10: 高碳 / 不鏽鋼 High-Carbon/ Stainless Steels (10, 11)
Week 11: 鑄鐵 Cast Irons (12)
Week 12: 鋁 / 銅與銅合金 Aluminum/ Copper and Copper Alloys (13, 14)
Week 13: 鎂 / 鈦合金 Magnesium/ Titanium Alloys (15, 16)
Week 14: 高溫使用之金屬 Metals for High-Temperature Service (17)
Week 15: 工程聚合物 Engineering Polymers (18)
Week 16: 期末考 Final Exam - 因應教室整修工程
Week 17: 陶瓷與玻璃 Ceramics and Glasses (19)- 遠距
Week 18:	複合材料 Composite Materials (20)- 遠距
